size-in-table-tennis.probleme: Size advantages and disadvantages in table tennis

debutant.nom: Focus on developing footwork as a tall player
debutant.description: To compensate for the lack of quick movement, taller players need to focus on developing their footwork.

debutant.nom: Practice specific motion to increase quickness
debutant.description: Constant practice of a specific motion increases quickness as the nervous system learns to react faster and faster.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Short and long serves to develop hand/arm quickness

metriques_progression.nom: Increase in quickness through neuromuscular adaptation

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Failing to develop good footwork as a tall player
erreurs_a_eviter.description: Taller players are not forced to move as often, and so they often do not develop good footwork.
